code: import lists from'./reducers/ListReducer';import todos from'./reducers/TodoReducer';import listUpdateId from'./reducers/ListIdReducer';import TodoUpdateId from'./reducers/TodoIdReducer';import TodoDataUpdateId from'./reducers/TodoDataUpdateId';import{combineReducers,createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var reducers=combineReducers({lists:lists,todos:todos,TodoUpdateId:TodoUpdateId,TodoDataUpdateId:TodoDataUpdateId,listUpdateId:listUpdateId});var store=createStore(reducers,compose(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export default store;
